00003 #define INF 10000

00005 CQSABIDDLMTracer::CQSABIDDLMTracer()
00006 {
00007 }

00009 QString CQSABIDDLMTracer::name() const
00010 {
00011     return QString("QSABIDDLM");
00012 }
00013 
00014 bool CQSABIDDLMTracer::checkSSS( const STreeNode *node,
00015                                  int depth, int qsDepth ) const
00016 {
00017     if( node->s_childList.count() == 0 )
00018         return true;
00019     
00020     if( depth == 0 )
00021     {
00022         if( (!node->s_quiescent) || qsDepth == 0 )
00023             return true;
00024         qsDepth--;
00025     }
00026     else
00027         depth--;
00028     
00029     if( node->s_childList.count() == 1 )
00030         return checkSSS( node->s_childList.first(), depth, qsDepth );
00031     
00032     return false;
00033 }
00034 
00035 float CQSABIDDLMTracer::sssValue( const STreeNode *node,
00036                                   int depth, int qsDepth ) const
00037 {
00038     if( node->s_childList.count() == 0 )
00039         return node->s_value;
00040     
00041     if( depth == 0 )
00042     {
00043         if( (!node->s_quiescent) || qsDepth == 0 )
00044             return node->s_value;
00045         qsDepth--;
00046     }
00047     else
00048         depth--;
00049     
00050     return sssValue( node->s_childList.first(), depth, qsDepth );
00051 }
00052 
00053 STreeTrace * CQSABIDDLMTracer::trace( const STreeNode *rootNode,
00054                                   int depth, int qsDepth ) const
00055 {
00056     STreeTrace *newTrace = new STreeTrace;
00057     newTrace->s_aiName = name();
00058     newTrace->s_columnNames = 
00059         QString("call|open|eval|value|a,B|best action,value").split('|');
00060     
00061     if( rootNode == NULL )
00062         return newTrace;
00063     if( rootNode->s_childList.isEmpty() )
00064         return newTrace;
00065     
00066     int d;
00067     STreeCall *curDepth;
00068     for( d = 1; d <= depth; ++d )
00069     {
00070         curDepth = new STreeCall;
00071         traceCall( curDepth, rootNode, d, qsDepth, -INF, INF, true );
00072         
00073         ((SQSABIDDLMLine*)(*curDepth)[0])->s_call = 
00074                                         QString("DLM(%1,%2,%3,-INF,INF)")
00075                                         .arg(rootNode->s_name)
00076                                         .arg(d)
00077                                         .arg(qsDepth);
00078         ((SQSABIDDLMLine*)(curDepth->s_lines.last()))->s_boxAction = true;
00079         ((SQSABIDDLMLine*)(curDepth->s_lines.last()))->s_boxValue = false;
00080         
00081         newTrace->s_depths.append( curDepth );
00082     }
00083     
00084     return newTrace;
00085 }
00086 
00087 void CQSABIDDLMTracer::traceCall( STreeCall *call, const STreeNode *node,
00088                                   int depth, int qsDepth,
00089                                   float alpha, float beta, bool max ) const
00090 {
00091     if( call == NULL || node == NULL )
00092         return;
00093 
00094     QString open;
00095     STreeNode *curNode;
00096     foreach( curNode, node->s_childList )
00097         open += curNode->s_name + " ";
00098     open = open.simplified();
00099     
00100     SQSABIDDLMLine *curLine;
00101     QString bestAction;
00102     float bestValue = -1;
00103     int curDepth, curQSDepth;
00104     float curAlpha = alpha, curBeta = beta;
00105     bool better;
00106     bool isEndPoint;
00107     foreach( curNode, node->s_childList )
00108     {
00109         curDepth = depth;
00110         curQSDepth = qsDepth;
00111         curLine = new SQSABIDDLMLine;
00112         
00113         curLine->s_open = open;
00114         curLine->s_eval = open.section( ' ', 0, 0 );
00115         open = open.section( ' ', 1, -1 );
00116         
00117         if( curDepth > 0 )
00118             curDepth--;
00119         else
00120             curQSDepth--;
00121         
00122         isEndPoint = false;
00123         if( (curNode->s_childList.count() == 0)
00124           ||(curDepth == 0 && (!curNode->s_quiescent || curQSDepth == 0)) )
00125             isEndPoint = true;
00126         
00127         curLine->s_valueCall = max?"Min":"Max";
00128         curLine->s_valueCall += QString("V(%1,%2,%3,%4,%5)")
00129                                 .arg(curNode->s_name)
00130                                 .arg(curDepth)
00131                                 .arg(curQSDepth)
00132                                 .arg(SQSABIDDLMLine::numberToString(curAlpha))
00133                                 .arg(SQSABIDDLMLine::numberToString(curBeta));
00134         if( isEndPoint )
00135         {
00136             curLine->s_valueValue = curNode->s_value;
00137             curLine->s_sss = false;
00138         }
00139         else if( checkSSS( curNode, curDepth, curQSDepth ) )
00140         {
00141             curLine->s_valueValue = sssValue( curNode, curDepth, curQSDepth );
00142             curLine->s_sss = true;
00143         }
00144         else
00145         {
00146             call->s_children.append( new STreeCall() );
00147             traceCall( call->s_children.last(), curNode,
00148                        curDepth, curQSDepth,
00149                        curAlpha, curBeta, !max );
00150             curLine->s_valueValue = call->s_children.last()->s_returnValue;
00151         }
00152         curLine->s_qs = (curDepth == 0 && curQSDepth > 0
00153                          && curNode->s_quiescent);
00154 
00155         if( bestAction.isEmpty() )
00156             better = true;
00157         else
00158         {
00159             if( max )   better = (curLine->s_valueValue > bestValue );
00160             else        better = (curLine->s_valueValue < bestValue );
00161         }
00162         if( better )
00163         {
00164             bestAction = node->s_name + curNode->s_name;
00165             bestValue = curLine->s_valueValue;
00166             
00167             if( max )
00168             {
00169                 if( bestValue > curBeta )
00170                     curLine->s_prune = true;
00171                 else if( bestValue > curAlpha )
00172                     curAlpha = bestValue;
00173             }
00174             else
00175             {
00176                 if( bestValue < curAlpha )
00177                     curLine->s_prune = true;
00178                 else if( bestValue < curBeta )
00179                     curBeta = bestValue;
00180             }
00181         }
00182         
00183         curLine->s_alpha = curAlpha;
00184         curLine->s_beta = curBeta;
00185         
00186         curLine->s_bestAction = bestAction;
00187         curLine->s_bestValue = bestValue;
00188         
00189         call->s_lines.append( curLine );
00190         
00191         if( curLine->s_prune )
00192             break;
00193         
00194         if( curLine->s_sss )
00195         {
00196             if( curLine->s_valueValue <= curLine->s_alpha )
00197                 curLine->s_prune = true;
00198             else if( curLine->s_valueValue >= curLine->s_beta )
00199                 curLine->s_prune = true;
00200         }
00201     }
00202     
00203     call->s_returnValue = bestValue;
00204     ((SQSABIDDLMLine*)call->s_lines.first())->s_call = 
00205         QString(max?"MaxV(%1,%2,%3,%4,%5)":"MinV(%1,%2,%3,%4,%5)")
00206         .arg(node->s_name)
00207         .arg(depth)
00208         .arg(qsDepth)
00209         .arg(SQSABIDDLMLine::numberToString(alpha))
00210         .arg(SQSABIDDLMLine::numberToString(beta));
00211     ((SQSABIDDLMLine*)call->s_lines.last())->s_boxValue = true;
00212 }

00214 SQSABIDDLMLine::SQSABIDDLMLine()
00215 {
00216     s_call = QString();
00217     s_open = QString();
00218     s_eval = QString();
00219     
00220     s_valueCall = QString();
00221     s_valueValue = 0.0;
00222     s_qs = false;
00223     s_sss = false;
00224     s_prune = false;
00225     
00226     s_alpha = -INF;
00227     s_beta = INF;
00228     
00229     s_bestAction = QString();
00230     s_boxAction = false;
00231     s_bestValue = 0.0;
00232     s_boxValue = false;
00233 }

00235 SQSABIDDLMLine::~SQSABIDDLMLine()
00236 {
00237 }
00238 
00239 QString SQSABIDDLMLine::numberToString( float val )
00240 {
00241     if( val == INF )
00242         return QString("INF");
00243     if( val == -INF )
00244         return QString("-INF");
00245     return QString::number(val);
00246 }
00247 
00248 QString SQSABIDDLMLine::operator [](int index)
00249 {
00250     QString ret;
00251     
00252     switch( index )
00253     {
00254     case 0: //  CALL
00255         ret = s_call;
00256         break;        
00257     case 1: //  OPEN
00258         ret = s_open;
00259         break;   
00260     case 2: //  EVAL
00261         ret = s_open.section(' ', 0, 0);
00262         break;   
00263     case 3: //  VALUE
00264         ret = s_valueCall;
00265         ret += "=" + QString::number( s_valueValue );
00266         if( s_qs || s_sss || s_prune )
00267         {
00268             ret += " (";
00269             if( s_qs )
00270             {
00271                 ret += "QS";
00272                 if( s_sss || s_prune )
00273                     ret += ",";
00274             }
00275             if( s_sss )
00276             {
00277                 ret += "SSS";
00278                 if( s_prune )
00279                     ret += ",";
00280             }
00281             if( s_prune )
00282                 ret += "prune";
00283             ret += ")";
00284         }
00285         break;
00286     case 4: //  a,b
00287         ret += numberToString(s_alpha);
00288         ret += ", ";
00289         ret += numberToString(s_beta);
00290         break;
00291     case 5: //  BEST ACTION,VALUE
00292         if( s_boxAction )
00293             ret = QString("[%1], ").arg(s_bestAction);
00294         else
00295             ret = s_bestAction + ", ";
00296         if( s_boxValue )
00297             ret += QString("[%1]").arg(s_bestValue);
00298         else
00299             ret += QString::number(s_bestValue);
00300         break;   
00301     default:
00302         break;
00303     }
00304     
00305     return ret;
00306 }

00308 QStringList SQSABIDDLMLine::toStringList()
00309 {
00310     QStringList ret;
00311     
00312     for( int i = 0; i < 6; ++i )
00313         ret += (*this)[i];
00314     
00315     return ret;
00316 }
